file_content.text: Tear 'em to pieces, I will. Soon as I get me some new fingers.
Stop mincin' around and talk to Peters if ya wanna see a run.
Any of the other runners get near me, I'm gonna jump on 'em and claw their faces off and take their shells for myself. That's how ya win.
You've got spirit. You're the runner for me!
You leave it to Mishta. I'll leave 'em in pieces, I will.
Right, well, good luck with that.
Ya gots to hurt 'em, ya see! That's why I go for the eyes!
Whatcha lookin' at, eh? Talk to Peters about the runnin'.
